Plot: Chris Long is an ex-NCAA basketball player turned trainer who finds a new purpose when his gym's new owner, Jack, unleashes a lucrative plan to turn the neglected business into a reality show. When Chris' co-workers resist this new direction, he and Jack form an unlikely alliance that allows them to face the demons of their pasts and ultimately, save the gym's future.
Reception: Rotten Tomatoes gave the film a score of 14% based on reviews from 7 critics.[4]
production_company: Full Blitz Entertainment Check Your Head Films Tortoise Entertainment
produced_by: Brian Drolet|Hoyt Richards|Reagan Rosson|Barry Katz|Josh Goldstein|
starring: Brian Drolet|Mircea Monroe|Jaleel White|Taylor Cole|Jay Mohr|Frenchie Davis|Olivia Taylor Dudley|Tom Arnold|Andy Milonakis|
